## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G22500](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G22500)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATECP31</u>
- **Gene Name:** LATE EMBRYOGENESIS ABUNDANT PROTEIN ECP31
- **Description:**   Seed maturation protein;(source:Araport11)
